name: Pool Party – Dress Up, Makeover, and Swim with Your Friends
name_original: Pool Party – Dress Up, Makeover, and Swim with Your Friends
description:
Lets have a Pool Party Today! Download and enjoy a day out with your friends swim, eat, dress up, and have loads of fun!
Who doesn’t love spending their summers swimming at the pool? Come join this pool party where you don’t only swim, enjoy food at the concession stand, snow cones, changing your bathing suit, and don’t forget to show your friends when you are done!

How to Play Pool Party:
Grab your towel, sunscreen, and toys! Head into the pool where you can go down the slide, jump off the diving board, and don’t forget swim. Your friend will let you know when she is hungry or needs a shower. Simply tap where your friends wants to go and enjoy feeding and styling her! And great new….There is more to come!

Features:
- 5 Mini Games – All complete with Fun Fun Fun!
- Snap Pictures to share with your friends.
- Enjoy hours of endless entertainment!
- Explore all areas of the map.
- Unlock new clothes and Accessories to Style your Friend.

Download Pool Party Free Today!
